title: Drawing, Study for a painting: Hagar and Ishmael in the Desert., May 1894
title_raw: Study for a painting: Hagar and Ishmael in the Desert.
medium: Brush and brown, gray, black and white wash, graphite on gray paper.
signed: Signed and dated in pen and ink, lower left: ... T. Moran. May 1894.
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and ink, lower left: Study for a painting: Hagar and Ishamel in the Desert.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of the reclining Ishamel and the kneeling Hagar in left center.  A gnarled and balsted tree, and boulders are in the right foreground.  A plateau with a canyon and at right, castellated rocks form the background.

Mount: originally contained two mountain landscapes sketched on verso [see curatorial remarks, Berliner 1942].

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Study for a painting: Hagar and Ishmael in the Desert., May 1894. Brush and brown, gray, black and white wash, graphite on gray paper.. 
Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-80
